entry.title: 3M 3334R-12X50 - 3M Flexible Prismatic Reflective Barricade Sheeting, 3334R, white/orange with 4 in stripe/right, 12 in x 50 yd 3334R-12X50 7000129531
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 387.04

[shortdesc]

3M Flexible Prismatic Reflective Barricade Sheeting, 3334R, white/orange with 4 in stripe/right, 12 in x 50 yd

  • 3M™ Flexible Prismatic Reflective Barricade Sheeting is a prismatic lens retroreflective sheeting designed for the production of rigid or reboundable traffic control devices such as barrels, barricades and channelizers
  • Featuring impact-resistant prismatic lens technology, this weather-resistant sheeting is coated with a pressure-sensitive adhesive to allow for quick and easy application
  • This sheeting is engineered for visibility even at high entrance angles in compromised conditions.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Impact-resistant, prismatic lens retroreflective sheeting
  • Designed for the production of traffic control barricades
  • Engineered for high daytime and nighttime visibility, appearing bright in low light
  • Pressure-sensitive adhesive backing
  • Colour: White/orange with 4 in stripe/right
  • Meets ASTM D4956 Type III
    		•

entry.title: 3M RS34F-36X36(50) - 3M Diamond Grade Roll Up Sign Sheeting, RS34F, fluorescent orange, 36 in x 36 in, 50 per package RS34F-36X36(50) 7000129332
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 2215.50

[shortdesc]

3M Diamond Grade Roll Up Sign Sheeting, RS34F, fluorescent orange, 36 in x 36 in, 50 per package

  • 3M™ Diamond Grade™ Roll Up Sign Sheeting is a fluorescent, prismatic lens retroreflective sheeting designed for the production of roll-up traffic control signs often used in construction zones
  • Formed on a flexible, UV-stabilized polymeric film constructed on a fibre backing, this light-activated sign sheeting is engineered to provide higher daytime and nighttime visibility than non-fluorescent and enclosed lens sheeting
  • A durable, protective film on the sheeting’s face helps prevent abrasions and wide angle retroreflectivity keeps this sign visible at any orientation.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Fluorescent, prismatic lens reflective sheeting
  • Formed on UV-stabilized polymeric film with abrasion-resistant coating
  • Designed for the production of temporary roll-up traffic control signs
  • Engineered for high daytime and nighttime visibility, appearing bright in low light
  • Portable, flexible and easy to set up and store
  • Fibre backing—no adhesive
  • Colour: Fluorescent orange
    		•

entry.title: 3M RS24-36INX36IN - 3M Diamond Grade Linear Delineation Panels, LDS-R346, red, 34 in x 6 in RS24-36INX36IN 7000055536
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 703.45

[shortdesc]

3M Diamond Grade Linear Delineation Panels, LDS-R346, red, 34 in x 6 in

  • 3M™ Linear Delineation Panels are designed to provide clear visual guidance for drivers navigating through work zones and challenging roadway conditions
  • Fabricated from 3M™ Diamond Grade™ Reflective Sheeting and laminated onto a thin gauge of aluminum, these corrugated panels provide highly visible retroreflection across a wide range of entrance and observation angles
  • Panels are available in bright and fluorescent colours to provide increased visibility both in daytime and at nighttime
  • Use 3M™ Linear Delineation panels to call attention to altered or changing roadway and can be mounted on surfaces like utility boxes, concrete barriers and metal guardrails
  • Panels include 3M™ VHB™ Tape adhesive strips for application on the back of each panel for easy installation.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Made with durable 3M™ Diamond Grade™ Reflective Sheeting laminated onto a thin gauge of aluminum
  • Bright colours and 3M™ Diamond Grade™ Full Cube Retroreflectors appear highly visible both in daytime and at nighttime
  • Corrugated design increases visibility across a wide range of entrance and observation angles
  • Provides clear visual guidance for drivers navigating through work zones and challenging roadway conditions
  • Apply 3M™ VHB™ Tape on back side for easy installation
  • Colour: Red
    		•

entry.title: JET FA-5S - 5 Ton 15' Lift 230/460V 3Ph Electric Chain Hoist Heavy Duty 107216
entry.summary:
Vendor: JET
Type: Chain Hoists
Price: 8098.43

[shortdesc]

5 Ton 15' Lift 230/460V 3PH Electric Chain Hoist - Heavy Duty

  • Available in single phase or three phase models and various voltages (specify when ordering)
  • 1/2 ton - 5 ton capacities
  • Chain is heat treated, case hardened low wear chain surpassing ISO Class T
  • All models complete with chain collector bucket
  • Reliable electro-magnetic DC brake engages automatically when power is cut off
  • Two button pendant control automatically returns to OFF mode when either button is released
  • 24 volt pendant control for operator safety in damp or humid conditions
  • Strain relief cable protects electrical connections
  • Top and bottom safety hooks designed to bend slowly to warn of overloads
  • Upper and lower limit switches protect hoist from damage if load or chain stop contacts body
  • Gear train and electrical components completely sealed for use outdoors (cover recommended)
  • Modular construction of motor, gear train, and brake assembly allows for quick and easy maintenance
  • Single phase hoists equipped with automatic overload protection preset to 110% of rated capacity
  • Three phase hoists feature reverse phase protection
  • Meets ASME B30.16, CSA, and OSHA standards
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand JET
    Product Type Chain Hoists

    Extra Product Information

  • Tested to 125% of rated capacity
  • Top and bottom safety hooks
  • Chain container included

    • Product Information

  • Rated Lifting Capacity : 11,000 lb
  • Standard Lift : 15'
  • Standard Chain Bucket : #5
  • Hoisting Speed : 4.8 FPM
  • Voltage : 230/460 V
  • Power Source : 3 ph
  • Head Room : 35.43 Inch
  • Motor Power : 2.1 HP
  • Duty Rating : 30 min
  • Power Cable Length : 16'
  • Number of Falls : 5
  • Amperes : 5.8 / 3.2

entry.title: JET #10-2 - 6 Ton 5' Lift #10 Series Cast Lever Chain Hoist Super Heavy Duty 110244
entry.summary:
Vendor: JET
Type: Chain Hoists
Price: 3458.27

[shortdesc]

6 Ton 5' Lift #10 Series Cast Lever Chain Hoist - Super Heavy Duty

  • The toughest lever chain hoist made!
  • High tensile strength cast steel housing protects gears from impact damage
  • Cast steel handle provides maximum strength and leverage
  • Simple design makes routine inspection or maintenance fast and easy
  • Non-asbestos brake discs use a high quality low abrasion aramid fibre material for a safer and healthier environment
  • Easy free wheeling system automatically returns to hoisting mode when load is applied
  • High grade low-wear chain is strong and smooth finished to prevent snagging or jamming
  • Gauge included to check for chain elongation and hook stretch
  • Top and bottom safety hooks are standard, and are designed to bend slowly to warn of overloads
  • Each unit is tested to 150% of rated capacity
  • Meets ANSI B30.21 Standards (Certificate included)
  • Made in Japan
  • NOTE: Custom Lifts are available in any length desired
  • Ask your local JET distributor for details!
    • [/shortdesc]

Vendor: JET
Type: Chain Hoists
Price: 634.21

[shortdesc]

3/4 Ton 5' Lift Mini-Mite II Lever Chain Hoist - Super Heavy Duty

  • New improved design is smaller and lighter than the original Mini Mite
  • Class V+ Chain is world's strongest and is exclusive to JET
  • Allows use of smaller load chain without compromising safety
  • Zinc coated load chain and coated brake hub minimize corrosion
  • One simple lever changes direction and disengages gear train for fast chain adjustments
  • New larger hooks with extra heavy duty latches
  • Riveted rubber handle for comfort and safety
  • Electrostatic powder painted before assembly to protect against rust
  • Capacity unaffected at temperatures up to -40°C with suitable winter lubrication
  • Tested to 150% of rated capacity
  • Meets ANSI B30.21 specifications (Certificate included)
  • Made in Japan

entry.summary:
Vendor: JET
Type: Bottle Jacks
Price: 182.04

[shortdesc]

12-1/2 Ton JET Hydraulic Bottle Jack - Low Profile - Super Heavy Duty

  • JET industrial hydraulic bottle jacks have earned a reputation for super heavy duty performance, reliability and dependability for over 40 years
  • Electrically welded base and cylinder assures strength and eliminates leaks
  • Not affected by temperature extremes
  • All models work in upright, angle or horizontal positions
  • Unique valving allows handle to remain in upright position when used horizontally for improved opertaion
  • Cleated steel lift saddle for safest operator conditions
  • Equipped with convenient extension screw for low pick up height adjustment
  • Available in Standard and Low Profile models (LP)
  • Fully serviceable
  • common release valve assemblies and other interchangeable parts allow quick repairs

  • Tested to over 150% of rated capacities

entry.title: JET MM320 - 3 Ton 5' Lift Mini-Mite Ii Lever Chain Hoist Super Heavy Duty 110512
entry.summary:
Vendor: JET
Type: Chain Hoists
Price: 1253.39

[shortdesc]

3 Ton 5' Lift Mini-Mite II Lever Chain Hoist - Super Heavy Duty

  • New improved design is smaller and lighter than the original Mini Mite
  • Class V+ Chain is world's strongest and is exclusive to JET
  • Allows use of smaller load chain without compromising safety
  • Zinc coated load chain and coated brake hub minimize corrosion
  • One simple lever changes direction and disengages gear train for fast chain adjustments
  • New larger hooks with extra heavy duty latches
  • Riveted rubber handle for comfort and safety
  • Electrostatic powder painted before assembly to protect against rust
  • Capacity unaffected at temperatures up to -40°C with suitable winter lubrication
  • Tested to 150% of rated capacity
  • Meets ANSI B30.21 specifications (Certificate included)
  • Made in Japan
    • [/shortdesc]
